PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-04162010-03-25,  HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectEx-Gratia Payment - Military Families Fund
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Canadian Heritage to issue a one-time EX-GRATIA PAYMENT of $250,000.00 to the MILITARY FAMILIES FUND on behalf of Their Royal Highnesses The Prince of Wales and The Duchess of Cornwall. Instead of the customary official gift offered upon Royal Visits, Their Royal Highnesses asked that a contribution be made to an organization that supports military personnel and their families.
AttachmentsAttachment
